action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Guys, can you please action this one:
We had a meeting with Ben last week and we have produced a solution for the home page ‘product section’. You’ll remember you did a quick ad hoc live demo of what we could do which involved naming/highlighting the products on side but since then I’ve presented Ben the idea of doing an automatic carousel that just runs through a selection of 4 products images with a small caption positioned at the top of the page. I have attached the link here , if you need the artwork and images separated let me know and I’ll send you a dropbox link.

The link for the ‘here’ is: https://xd.adobe.com/view/e90e2079-504b-41aa-ad35-36ddafe52617-bc5d/screen/9bb89f46-aa78-4841-96c3-86e2741b76c7/ and it’s to replace the row in the attached screen shot. Will need to be a carousel/slider.

Thanks!!

Thanks Heath,

Appreciate it!

We had a meeting with Ben last week and we have produced a solution for the home page ‘product section’. You’ll remember you did a quick ad hoc live demo of what we could do which involved naming/highlighting the products on side but since then I’ve presented Ben the idea of doing an automatic carousel that just runs through a selection of 4 products images with a small caption positioned at the top of the page. I have attached the link here <https://xd.adobe.com/view/e90e2079-504b-41aa-ad35-36ddafe52617-bc5d/screen/9bb89f46-aa78-4841-96c3-86e2741b76c7>, if you need the artwork and images separated let me know and I’ll send you a dropbox link.

Ben asked if we could update the font weight on the menu navigation to ‘regular’ instead of ‘light’ and space it out a touch more (I’ve attached a screenshot of the section I’m referring too, the other nav that appears on the left is fine)

Warm regards,

Keenan Druce
Graphic Designer

<https://acoufelt.com/au/>
